replies.msg: 如果港大被圍，要姓張果條共狗出嚟談判保護學生係冇可能，佢分分鐘引埋兵入關。港大有冇德高望重嘅學生事務長、院長、前校長、甚至校友會會長可以行出嚟幫班學生？

好我搵埋佢。啱啱搵左我自己學院個dean. 學者喺ivory tower入面唔知同世界脫左節未，又可能驚槍打出頭鳥...
巴打可唔可以都搵搵

如果有人有用以下係我email內容：


My name is xxx, a Xx graduate in 19xx/20xx. I hope you’re staying safe in this chaotic time in Hong Kong.

I’m sure you have seen the gutting news regarding the police’s attack at CUHK yesterday. This morning they have entered HKU and like many alumni I’m extremely worried about the safety of our students. I’m certain that if the police fires at HKU, there will be students and alumni defending the university. Please would you stand with our students and understand that they love their school, and would you please protect them from harm?

The confrontation/clash with police has never been an equal match, and we are completely helpless. I hope universities can remain a safe place for students and staff.

quote.msg: 共狗張翔一句都唔可以信
